text:
e="preserve">“Never Worn White” is a song recorded by American recording artist Katy Perry. It was released on March 4, 2020. The song is a slow ballad that uses “Wedding March” as its intro. She wrote the song with Jacob Kasher, John Ryan, and its producer, Johan Karlsson.
Perry wears long white dresses in the music video and cradles her baby bump in the video’s last scene. This was an announcement that she was expecting her first child with her fiancé, actor Orlando Bloom. On March 10th, 2020, Perry gave the first performance of the song on Australian talk show "The Project.'￼"
